<p>
    <div class="container" style="width: 960px; height: 945px">
        <div class="col-xs-4">
            <div id="map" style="position:center; width: 960px; height: 720px">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 945 960" class="img-responsive">
                    <!--Tasman-->
                    <path fill="#dddddd" stroke="#9e9e9e" d="M681,60,682,63,681,66,681,71,684,73,686,73,690,76,691,81,695,82,700,83,699,87,696,88,694,88,692,89,690,91,690,94,694,98,697,95,699,93,703,92,706,92,711,92,712,98,714,101,716,102,717,107,719,108,722,109,725,111,725,114,730,115,730,121,726,123,723,124,721,126,720,128,721,130,721,137,721,139,719,141,715,143,712,145,708,145,705,145,703,147,703,152,701,155,698,157,695,159,695,161,693,164,693,166,693,170,691,174,689,175,687,175,685,176,684,178,683,180,684,183,681,189,678,189,673,188,671,189,670,192,667,198,667,200,667,206,667,208,665,215,665,219,666,225,667,227,668,229,670,234,670,236,670,238,675,239,677,239,679,241,682,242,685,248,690,248,693,248,693,255,694,259,696,264,699,265,701,266,703,268,708,267,719,258,725,256,724,248,727,245,727,242,727,238,730,238,732,238,734,240,737,241,737,230,741,231,743,229,746,223,749,219,753,214,755,209,756,205,760,201,762,197,762,192,765,190,771,186,775,183,774,178,776,173,779,171,781,170,785,167,788,165,788,163,792,162,796,162,798,162,801,162,801,159,799,157,798,154,798,150,801,148,801,146,803,144,809,143,811,140,815,136,820,132,821,126,826,124,831,122,836,119,839,116,840,113,841,111,841,109,843,104,837,96,831,101,824,102,821,109,818,109,812,110,807,111,804,115,803,117,801,120,799,124,796,127,787,129,787,134,784,130,780,126,775,126,777,120,775,117,769,114,767,112,767,110,770,108,771,105,770,102,767,99,768,97,770,95,768,91,767,88,772,85,774,79,774,75,774,71,768,71,767,67,767,62,763,62,762,65,758,69,757,66,752,68,746,68,744,64,741,62,736,61,735,58,732,54,732,48,731,45,731,39,731,35,735,29,737,25,741,23,746,22,754,24,760,27,775,29,768,27,762,25,726,22,721,23,719,27,723,30,719,34,715,35,714,33,703,38,697,44,692,47,686,55,681,60" style="-webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); stroke-linejoin: round; cursor: pointer;" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke-width="1" stroke-linejoin="round" data-hasqtip="0" stroke-dasharray="0"></path>

</p>
